title: Omelet with ground beef and cavolo nero
directions: Beat the eggs with the milk separately and season with pepper and salt. Heat omelet per half tbsp oil in a nonstick frying pan and fry the egg mixture succession of so many omelets as you need. Keep warm under a lid on a plate.
Meanwhile, remove the skin from the Tuscan sausages. Grate the yellow rind of the lemon and squeeze the half.

Heat the remaining oil in a wok and fry the sausage meat in 3 min. Rul. Add the cavolo nero and fry for 2 minutes. Season with the lemon zest, lemon juice (1 tablespoon per 4 omelettes), pepper and salt.
Brush the omelets with hummus and divide the vegetable mixture on top. Clap twice, cut diagonally and serve immediately.
